English:
Hey, [p]!
What are you doing here?
Chinese:
喔！[p]！
怎麼啦？跑到這種地方來？
Korean:
오, [p]!
어쩐 일이야, 이런 곳에 다 오고?
German:
He, [p]!
Was machst du denn hier?

English:
Well, I'm just glad you're here.
Do you know where Sakura is now?
Chinese:
不過你來的正好……
你知道櫻那傢伙現在人在哪嗎？
Korean:
…하지만 마침 잘 됐어…
사쿠라 녀석, 지금 어디 있는지 혹시 알아?
German:
Ich bin nur froh, dass du da bist.
Weißt du, wo Sakura gerade ist?

English:
Um, no, not in particular! There's no deep meaning
there. I'm worried 'cause she's been odd lately.
Chinese:
唔，嗯，沒什麼！沒有什麼特別的意思啦！
只是覺得她最近看起來怪怪的，所以有點擔心……
Korean:
으, 아, 아니, 딱히! 깊은 의미는, 없는데
최근 상태가 이상했고, 좀 신경 쓰인다고 할까…
German:
Ähm, nein, nicht besonders! Ich habe mir nichts
weiter dabei gedacht! Ich mache mir nur Sorgen,
weil sie in letzter Zeit so seltsam ist.

English:
Whoa! S-S-S-Say whaaaat?!
She's gone missing?!
Chinese:
什！什、什、什、什、什麼———————？
你、你說……櫻行蹤不明——！？
Korean:
뭐어! 뭐, 뭐, 뭐, 뭐, 뭐라고―――――――!
사, 사쿠라가… 행방불명이 됐다고오오――!?

English:
Whoawhoawhoawhoawhoa, hang on!
Back it up! I wanna hear everything!
Chinese:
等、等等等一下！
這是怎麼一回事！？快告訴我詳情！
Korean:
자자자자자자, 잠깐!
그게 무슨 소리야!? 자세히 들려 줘!
German:
Moment, Moment, Moment!
Noch mal von vorn! Erzähl mir alles!

English:
That reminds me. She said something before about
an "evil pilgrimage" or something...
Chinese:
話說回來，
櫻之前好像說過什麼「惡魔巡禮」之類的……
Korean:
그러고 보니 사쿠라, 얼마 전에
"악마순례"가 이쩌고저쩌고 했던 것 같은데…
German:
Da fällt mir was ein. Sie hat schon mal was von
einer „dunklen Pilgerfahrt“ oder so ähnlich
gesagt ...

English:
This "evil pilgrimage" seems to be some event 
where only select few fans get to meet Jimiken.
Chinese:
「惡魔巡禮」是少數被吉米肯選上的粉絲才能參加的活動，
聽說可以直接見到吉米肯本人。
Korean:
"악마순례"란 지미켄에게 선택받은 팬만이
참가할 수 있는, 실제로 지미켄과 만날 수 있는 이벤트인가 봐
German:
Diese „dunkle Pilgerfahrt“ ist wohl ein Event,
wo wenige ausgewählte Fans Jimiken treffen dürfen.

English:
She's crazy! She'll be surrounded by hackers!
It's too dangerous for her to go by herself!
Chinese:
那個笨蛋！那裡到處都是駭客啊！
一個人去那種地方一定很危險啊！
Korean:
그 바보…! 주위엔 해커투성이라고!
그런 곳에 혼자 가면 위험할 게 뻔하잖아!
German:
Sie muss verrückt sein! Da wird sie umringt sein
von Hackern! Viel zu gefährlich für sie alleine!

English:
I'm coming for you, Sakura!
Hang on!
Chinese:
櫻！
我現在就去救妳！等等我—————！！
German:
Ich komme zu dir, Sakura!
Halt durch!

English: First of all, better report back to the agency.
Chinese: 總之先回事務所報告吧。
German: Ich sollte mich als Erstes wieder im Büro melden.
